LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_HunterAdult.baseDescrip: [CAPWN_nameDef] lived in the small settlement of Half El. It's [CAPWN_pronoun].

LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_PKHunterAdult.title: Elf Master Hunter
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_PKHunterAdult.baseDescr: [CAPWN_nameDef] is one of the most skilled hunters in the settlement. It's [CAPWN_pronoun].
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_KnightAdult.title: Elf Knight
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_KnightAdult.baseDescrip: [CAPWN_nameDef] is a knight who protects the settlement from enemies. It's [CAPWN_pronoun].
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_PKKnightAdult.title: Elven Guardian Knight
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_PKKnightAdult.baseDescr: [CAPWN_nameDef] is one of the strongest knights who defends a settlement from enemies. It's [CAPWN_pronoun].
